command: tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You made a wild Direbear trust you! Keep feeding it every once in a while to eventually tame it!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your taming progress has been reset!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You have succesfully tamed a Direbear!"}]}
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_oak_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_spruce_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_birch_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_jungle_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_dark_oak_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_acacia_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_azalea_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_flowered_azalea_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_mangrove_leaves
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_nether_wart_block
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_warped_wart_block
execute as @s[tag=!inWater] positioned as @s[tag=!inWater] run function cmd.direbear_harvest_sweet_berries
execute as @s[tag=inWater, tag=fishHarvestCool] run tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Cannot harvest fish for another 10 seconds!"}]}
execute as @s[tag=inWater, tag=!fishHarvestCool] positioned as @s[tag=inWater, tag=!fishHarvestCool] run loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot "harvest results/direbear/general water drops"
execute as @s[tag=inWater, tag=!fishHarvestCool] positioned as @s[tag=inWater, tag=!fishHarvestCool] run loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot "harvest results/direbear/jungle water drops"
execute as @s[tag=inWater, tag=!fishHarvestCool] positioned as @s[tag=inWater, tag=!fishHarvestCool] run loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot "harvest results/direbear/ocean water drops"
